participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and outgoing, loves animals and enjoys outdoor activities.
participant_1.background: i've three dogs. my father was a door to door salesman. i like to watch the olympics. i'm in an open polyamorous relationship. i also have a dog walking business.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Fashion-conscious and ambitious, enjoys luxury items and has a strong sense of individuality.
participant_2.background: my family does not support my career choices. i like shopping. i often shop for shoes and watches. my dream car is a rolls royce ghost. i currently work for a watch dealer.
